subject: Steroids
Baseball
Perjury
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In closing arguments, the prosecution asserted Barry Bonds lied to protect his accomplishments, while the defense countered that the government failed to present credible witnesses or evidence.
snippet: In closing arguments, the prosecution asserted Barry Bonds lied to protect his accomplishments, while the defense countered that the government failed to present credible witnesses or evidence.
